attributes.action: refund stamp duty paid on property under £175000 bought between 1st January to 24th March 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Last year the lower limit of stamp duty exemption was increased to £175000 until 1st January 2010. The latest budget abolishes stamp duty for property below £250000 as of 25th March 2010. This leaves a two and a half month gap where many first time buyers have lost out on thousands of pounds. Many of these people were most likely trying to complete before 1st Jan 2010.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
